content.rendered:
To those girls who dutifully straighten their strands into submission EVERY.SINGLE.MORNING, please stop.

“Curly hair is making a comeback – it is so much easier to style and maintain curls, so women are willing to embrace their natural texture, rather than work against it” explains Master Stylist Erin, who owns very curly hair herself. “I don’t go to bed with wet hair. It will leave your hair a mess in the morning” she explains. Instead, wrap your hair in a towel after showering to cut down on drying time without messing around with your natural curl pattern.

Prep your hair with moisture as it’s curly hair biggest friend. We are loving the new Oribe Highly Textured Hair Collection.

Discover the Collection..

 

Moisture & Control Deep Treatment Masque

Treat your curls right. Oribe’s ultimate moisturizing masque, with coconut and almond oils, quenches thirsty curls and prevents breakage while repairing damage. Hair is left silky, hydrated and healthier than ever.

 

Ideal for: All curly hair types wanting hydration and repair

Priming Lotion Leave-In Conditioner Detangler

Ease your routine. This silky, leave-in conditioning lotion instantly detangles to easy combing and prevent breakage. Oribe’s ultra-hydrating formula, with Cucuacu and Mango Seed Butters, moisturise and smooth strands for healthy, beautiful curls that are prepped for styling.

 

Ideal for: Wavy to Soft Curly hair seeking detangling and moisture.

Styling Butter Curl Enhancing Creme

Style richly. This deeply nourishing creme instantly melts into hair and defines coily curls. A blend of Shea Butter and Avocado Oil hydrates hair to protect from breakage and control frizz. Strength, softness and gold are at your fingertips.

Ideal for: Tight and coily curls seeking definition and medium hold.

Curl Gelée for Shine & Definition

For shine and definition. This silky, hydrating curl jelly tames, shapes and styles, making coils more manageable. Macadamia, Neem and Apricot oils moisturise and detangle strands. The result: ultra-shiny, defined curls.

 

Ideal for: Ultra curly and coils wanting ultra-shiny and smooth results.

Other Hot Tips…

  • Get a Diffuser – “Use it to dry your hair, but only until its 80% dry, which will help minimise frizzing” advises Erin. We recommend the GHD Diffuser.
  • Don’t fight the frizz too much – “A little bit of frizz can definitely work, so let your hair do it’s thing and tame it slightly using a hydrating curl product”. Erin suggests Curl Gloss by Oribe which has hydration and hold while protecting against humidity – puts a spring back in your slept in spirals.
  • Moisturise your curls – This will give your coils a little bounce. It’s important to give curly hair the right amount of nutrients to tame the frizz without corrupting the natural hair. Erin’s go to’s include Davines Oi Milk which is a multi-benefit leave in treatment, and Kerastase Oleo Curl Cream which creates supple and relaxed curls.
  • Wear your curls in the evening- For a more polished look, Erin recommends in starting with dry hair and using a GHD Classic Curl Tong to tweak and define your natural curls in the top layer and twist as curling. Apply Oribe Apres Beach which creates tousled beach inspired waves, giving the hair moisture and shine without the salty stiffness – perfect for anyone fantasizing about a St. Tropez night.
